game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.description: Ancient legends tell of a powerful artifact hidden deep within a treacherous dungeon. Your quest is to brave the dangers and retrieve the artifact.
game.reward: Legendary weapon and a bag of gold

task.objective: Acquire a map of the dungeon
task.description: The wizard tells you that a map with the location of the artifact is held by an old sage in the nearby village. You need to travel there and convince the sage to give you the map.
Within the dungeon, you will encounter powerful monsters guarding the artifact. You must defeat them to proceed.
Finally, reach the deepest chamber of the dungeon and retrieve the long-lost artifact.
